common.siteDescription: Discover yourself with AI-powered psychology tests, personality tests, MBTI and more.

home.heroDescription:
Psychology tests, personality analysis, MBTI and more!
Discover the real you with AI-powered tests.

test.guideNoAnswer: There are no wrong answers. Please answer honestly.
test.guideInstantResult: Results are available immediately after completing the test.
test.guideShare: Share and compare your results with friends!
test.screenshotShare: Take a screenshot and share with friends!

404.title: Page not found
404.description: The page you requested does not exist or has been moved.

500.title: Server Error
500.description: A temporary error occurred. Please try again later.

meta.categoryDescription: Enjoy {count} free tests in the {category} category!

categoryPage.noTests: No tests in this category yet.

physical.pageDescription: Test your physical and cognitive abilities!

info.title: Info
info.tip1: Physical tests work on both PC and mobile.
info.tip2: For accurate results, test in a quiet environment.
info.tip3: Click tests may be easier with touch than mouse.

reaction-speed.title: Reaction Speed Test
reaction-speed.description: Click as fast as you can when it turns green! What's your reaction time?

click-speed.title: Click Speed Test
click-speed.description: How fast can you click in 10 seconds?

color-blind.title: Color Vision Test
color-blind.description: Find the different color! Test your color discrimination ability.

memory-test.title: Short-term Memory Test
memory-test.description: Remember the sequence and repeat! Challenge your memory limits.

eye-tracking.title: Eye Exercise
eye-tracking.description: Eye stretching for healthy eyes! Relieve your eye fatigue.

typing-speed.title: Typing Speed Test
typing-speed.description: How fast can you type in 60 seconds? Measure your WPM!

number-memory.title: Number Memory Test
number-memory.description: Remember increasingly longer numbers! Challenge your memory limits.

aim-trainer.title: Aim Trainer
aim-trainer.description: Click the targets quickly and accurately!

hearing-test.title: Hearing Test
hearing-test.description: Test if you can hear various frequencies!

stroop-test.title: Stroop Test
stroop-test.description: Match the color, not the word! Test your brain's processing ability.

time-perception.title: Time Perception Test
time-perception.description: Estimate time accurately without a clock! Measure your internal clock.

peripheral-vision.title: Peripheral Vision Test
peripheral-vision.description: Detect objects appearing at the edge of the screen!

pattern-recognition.title: Pattern Recognition Test
pattern-recognition.description: Find the one different color! Measure your pattern recognition ability.

steady-hand.title: Steady Hand Test
steady-hand.description: Navigate through narrow paths with your mouse! Measure hand stability.

multitasking.title: Multitasking Test
multitasking.description: Solve math problems while clicking! Measure your multitasking ability.

rhythm-test.title: Rhythm Test
rhythm-test.description: Tap to the beat! Measure your sense of rhythm.

color-sequence.title: Color Memory Test
color-sequence.description: Simon game! Remember and repeat the color sequence.

word-memory.title: Word Memory Test
word-memory.description: Remember and type all the words! Measure your verbal memory.

direction-sense.title: Direction Sense Test
direction-sense.description: Find the right direction after rotation! Measure your sense of direction.

gamesPage.pageDescription: Fun games to enjoy with friends!

worldcup.title: Ideal Type World Cup
worldcup.description: Ramen, desserts, dogs and more! Find your preferences

balance.title: Balance Game
balance.description: If you had to choose one? Dating, work, extreme situations!

cards.title: Conversation Cards
cards.description: Ice-breaking conversation topics! For dates, parties, couples.

random-menu.title: What to Eat Today?
random-menu.description: Can't decide what to eat? Random menu picker!

number-picker.title: Random Picker
number-picker.description: Number picker, order decider, fair random draws!

team-divider.title: Team Divider
team-divider.description: Enter the number of people and teams for fair division!

penalty-picker.title: Penalty Picker
penalty-picker.description: From light to hardcore! Pick fun penalties

role-picker.title: Role Picker
role-picker.description: Mafia, Spy, Werewolf! Randomly assign game roles

would-you-rather.title: This vs That
would-you-rather.description: If you had to choose one? Debate with friends!

ice-breaker.title: Ice Breaker
ice-breaker.description: Magic question roulette to break the ice!

couple-quiz.title: Couple Quiz
couple-quiz.description: How well do you know your partner? Couple compatibility test!
